name: Storefront – Lines and Circles Animation
author: Shramee Srivastav

sections.description:
What does it do

Adds awesome lines and circles animation on your storefront installation with 5 circles connected to each other by lines, each circle shows an image in it with a heading and some description below it. Ideal for showing of key features of your organization, your product ( like a theme or a software ).

Structure

First four circles are customizable with custom image, heading and description. The last circle shows a scroll down button which scrolls the page down to show the content below the animation.

More nice features coming soon!

Pro version coming soon which will allow setting different link for each circle and some other nice tweaks ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
Installing can be done either by searching for “Storefront lines and circles” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

Download the plugin via WordPress.org.
Upload the ZIP file through the “Plugins > Add New > Upload” screen in your WordPress dashboard.
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
Visit the settings screen and configure, as desired.
sections.faq:
Where can I get support for getting this up and running on my site

Planning to do a video soon, which will replace this text. ;P

Does it only work with storefront?

At the moment yes, but we do plan to support more themes soon, this section will contain links to new plugins ones they are complete.

What about Genesis?

We are planning to do a version for Genesis too, it will be out by July/August 2016…

When can I buy the pro version?

It really depends on the response we get for this plugin. But we plan to do it by August/September.
